metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9816 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Xen through 4.7.x allows local ARM guest OS users to cause a denial ofservice (host crash) via vectors involving an asynchronous abort while atEL2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.6 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
libxenstore3.0 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.5-amd64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.5-arm64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.5-armhf - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.6-amd64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.6-arm64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-hypervisor-4.6-armhf - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-system-amd64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-system-arm64 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-system-armhf - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-utils-4.6 - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xen-utils-common - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
xenstore-utils - 4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.6.0-1ubuntu4.3').
